name: Kafka Connect Sink
shortDescription: Publish a Kafka Connect sink connector to Quix platform

Variables.Name: input
Variables.Description: This is the input topic from which to sink from

Variables.Name: CONNECT_OFFSET_STORAGE_TOPIC
Variables.Description: Topic name to use for storing kafka connect offsets

Variables.Name: CONNECT_CONFIG_STORAGE_TOPIC
Variables.Description: Topic name to use for storing connector and task configurations for kafka connect

Variables.Name: CONNECT_STATUS_STORAGE_TOPIC
Variables.Description: Topic name to use for storing statuses for kafka connect

Variables.Name: CONNECTOR_NAME
Variables.Description: The confluent hub (https://www.confluent.io/hub, free connectors only for now) kafka connector to use
